revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An Authentic account of an embassy from the King of Great Britain to the Emperor of China; including cursory observations made, and information obtained, in travel..."
revision.text: Possibly: An Authentic account of an embassy from the King of Great Britain to the Emperor of China; including cursory observations made, and information obtained, in travelling through that ancient empire, and a small part of Chinese Tartary...taken Chiefly form the papers of His Excellency the Earl of MacArtney...In Two Volumes, with Engravings; beside a Folio Volume of Plates. (By Sir George Staunton). (London : Printed by W. Bulmer and Co. for G. Nicol, Bookseller to His Majesty, Pall-Mall, MDCCXCVII. [1797]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2511758~S1
